[00:00.00]Weeeeee (Explicit) - Trippie Redd
[00:03.74]Lyrics by：Michael Lamar White II
[00:07.49]Composed by：Loaded/FBG Goat
[00:11.24]Loaded what up
[00:13.32]I'm a big dawg who you wanna be yeah
[00:17.16]Diamonds on my wrist and on my teeth
[00:20.22]I smoke zaza I'm in la la off them trees woo
[00:24.12]Took the t-tops off the 'vette
[00:25.42]I need a breeze yeah yeah
[00:27.62]And I do the f**kin' dash like need for speed skrrt
[00:31.42]I don't need a b***h what a b***h need yeah yeah
[00:34.40]She was off a X pill now she want ehh oh
[00:38.03]She went up a molly ramp and she went
[00:40.27]Wee yeah yeah
[00:43.01]Got a pound know what we doin' today
[00:44.54]I hang with them killers they ruin your day
[00:46.38]I'm feelin' good I'm super today
[00:47.80]Been with the gang and we feel like sly cooper today
[00:49.71]Got a bentley but I just might uber today
[00:51.52]Got a beam with me like a storm trooper today
[00:53.20]Hella stones on me like I'm medusa today
[00:55.06]And I'm blowin' up like I'm a boomer today
[00:56.84]I'm a superstar you a consumer today
[00:58.76]All-black whip look like a puma today
[01:00.52]I'm a king I'm with timon and pumbaa today
[01:02.19]In your dreams I'm big freddy krueger today
[01:03.93]Don't make me pop out with that ruler today
[01:05.67]Stretch your b***h on my dick it's like zumba today
[01:07.64]If they like to shoot I'm a shooter today
[01:09.16]Do the drill on a muhfuckin' scooter today
[01:10.79]Teach the world I might become a tutor today
[01:12.61]She wan' f**k I might toot her and boot her today
[01:14.45]Call her OVO thing come from hooters today yeah
[01:16.45]B-l-double-O-D I feel booler today
[01:18.03]Play with ice like a muhfuckin' cooler today
[01:20.05]Count up a mill' in the cullinan yeah
[01:21.94]Spent half a mill' for the fun of it yeah
[01:23.49]If we talkin' money b***h I got a bunch of it
[01:25.28]Who you wanna be yeah
[01:28.27]Diamonds on my wrist and on my teeth
[01:31.43]I smoke zaza I'm in la la off them trees woo
[01:35.15]Took the T-tops off the 'vette
[01:36.36]I need a breeze yeah yeah
[01:38.61]And I do the f**kin'
[01:39.72]Dash like need for speed skrrt
[01:42.36]I don't need a b***h
[01:43.66]What a b***h need yeah yeah
[01:45.76]She was off a X pill now she want ehh oh
[01:48.96]She went up a molly ramp and she went
[01:51.25]Wee yeah yeah
[01:53.24]Wee
[01:56.25]Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
[01:59.02]Oh ooh ooh ooh wee
[02:04.07]Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
[02:06.80]Ooh wee
data.trans:
[ti:Weeeeee (Explicit)]
[ar:Trippie Redd]
[al:Pegasus (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:03.74]//
[00:07.49]//
[00:11.24]上膛了什么
[00:13.32]我是个大人物你想变成谁
[00:17.16]我手腕上戴着钻石牙齿上镶着钻石
[00:20.22]我吞云吐雾我在洛杉矶的街头混得风生水起
[00:24.12]我脱掉了雪佛兰科尔维特的上衣
[00:25.42]我需要一丝微风
[00:27.62]我一路狂飙就像是对速度的渴望
[00:31.42]我不需要女人女人需要的是什么
[00:34.40]她以前吃了那种东西现在她欲罢不能
[00:38.03]她走上了那种东西
[00:40.27]那种东西
[00:43.01]我有一大笔钱知道我们今天要做什么吗
[00:44.54]我和杀手在一起他们毁了你的一天
[00:46.38]我感觉很好我今天超级开心
[00:47.80]一直和兄弟们在一起我们今天感觉就像SlyCooper
[00:49.71]我有一辆宾利但我今天可能会叫优步
[00:51.52]我随身带着枪今天就像一名突击队员
[00:53.20]身上好多钻石好像我是美杜莎
[00:55.06]今天我尽情放纵仿佛我是个婴儿潮一代
[00:56.84]我是超级明星如今你是个消费者
[00:58.76]全黑的豪车今天看起来就像美洲狮
[01:00.52]我是国王今天我和丁满还有彭彭在一起
[01:02.19]今天在你的梦里我就是FreddyKrueger
[01:03.93]今天不要让我拿着尺子突然出现
[01:05.67]//
[01:07.64]如果他们喜欢开枪我今天就是枪手
[01:09.16]今天在一辆摩托车上练习
[01:10.79]教导全世界我今天可能会成为一名家庭教师
[01:12.61]她想和我亲热我今天可能会和她纵享欢愉
[01:14.45]叫她OVO吧这一切都来自于如今的猫头鹰餐厅
[01:16.45]我今天感觉好兴奋
[01:18.03]今天玩钻石就像一个酷酷的人
[01:20.05]在库里南数一百万
[01:21.94]为了好玩花了五十万
[01:23.49]如果我们谈论金钱碧池我有很多钱
[01:25.28]你想变成谁
[01:28.27]我手腕上戴着钻石牙齿上镶着钻石
[01:31.43]我吞云吐雾我在洛杉矶的街头混得风生水起
[01:35.15]我把雪佛兰科尔维特的T恤脱掉
[01:36.36]我需要一丝微风
[01:38.61]由我来做
[01:39.72]狂飙就像对速度的渴望
[01:42.36]我不需要女人
[01:43.66]这娘们需要什么
[01:45.76]她以前吃了那种东西现在她欲罢不能
[01:48.96]她走上了那种东西
[01:51.25]那种东西
[01:53.24]极小的
[01:56.25]//
[01:59.02]亲爱的
[02:04.07]//
[02:06.80]天啊
